references.paper_title: Learning the structure of sum-product networks via an svd-based algorithm
references.reason: This paper introduces an algorithm for learning the structure of sum-product networks, a key topic in the field of probabilistic circuits.

references.paper_title: Sum product networks for activity recognition
references.reason: This paper demonstrates a practical application of probabilistic circuits in activity recognition, showcasing their utility in real-world problems.
This paper explores context-specific independence, a crucial concept for understanding the efficiency and expressiveness of probabilistic circuits.

references.paper_title: Polynomial semantics of tractable probabilistic circuits
references.reason: This paper delves into the theoretical underpinnings of probabilistic circuits, exploring their expressive power and connections to polynomial representation.

references.paper_title: Partial derivatives in arithmetic complexity and beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of partial derivatives in arithmetic circuits, a technique leveraged in the current paper to analyze the expressive power of probabilistic circuits.
